      bCryptPasswordEncoder - Autowired password encoder.
      javaMailSender - Autowired mail sender.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public Player register​(PlayerDTO dto) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Registers (adds) a user to Player table.
      Parameters:
      dto - DTO object that registered player is created from.
      Returns:
      Registered player
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the dto fields is invalid.
      See Also:
      Player, PlayerDTO

    • login

      public String login​(LoginDTO loginData) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Logs in a registered player.
      Parameters:
      loginData - DTO object that contains username and password.
      Returns:
      Token string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if username and password do not match.

    • requestPwCode

      public boolean requestPwCode​(org.json.JSONObject emailJSON)
      Given an email address, if it is registered, creates a password reset code, mails it and saves it to pending_pw_code table.
      Parameters:
      emailJSON - JSON object that contains the password that the mail is going to be sent.
      Returns:
      true if user is found and mail is sent successfully, false otherwise.

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword​(PasswordResetDTO passwordResetDTO)
      Given username, password reset code and a new password, if credentials are valid, sets the user's password to new password.
      Parameters:
      passwordResetDTO - DTO that contains, username, new password and password reset code.
      Returns:
      true if password is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • getLoggedInPlayer

      public Player getLoggedInPlayer()
      Given token, gets the Player
      Returns:
      Logged in player
